metadata.description: Indian Government Agricultural Schemes for Farmers

schemes.description: Direct income support of ₹6,000 per year to eligible farmer families in three equal installments of ₹2,000 each.
schemes.eligibility: All landholding farmer families. Excludes: Income tax payers, government employees, pensioners, institutional landholders.
schemes.benefits: ₹6,000/year in 3 installments (Apr-Jul, Aug-Nov, Dec-Mar) directly to bank account

schemes.scheme_name: PMFBY - Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (प्रधानमंत्री फसल बीमा योजना)
schemes.description: Comprehensive crop insurance scheme protecting farmers against crop loss due to natural calamities, pests, and diseases.
schemes.eligibility: All farmers growing notified crops in notified areas. Both loanee (compulsory) and non-loanee (voluntary) farmers.
schemes.benefits: Full sum insured against crop loss. Premium: Kharif 2%, Rabi 1.5%, Commercial crops 5%. Government pays remaining premium.

schemes.scheme_name: PMKSY - Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (प्रधानमंत्री कृषि सिंचाई योजना)
schemes.description: Enhances irrigation efficiency through micro-irrigation (drip & sprinkler) with 'Per Drop More Crop' initiative.
schemes.eligibility: All farmers with cultivable land. Priority to small and marginal farmers.
schemes.benefits: 55% subsidy for small/marginal farmers, 45% for others on micro-irrigation systems (drip/sprinkler).
how_to_apply: Apply through State Agriculture Department portal
Or visit nearest Krishi Vigyan Kendra (KVK)
Submit land documents and farmer ID

schemes.scheme_name: KCC - Kisan Credit Card (किसान क्रेडिट कार्ड)
schemes.description: Provides farmers with timely credit for agriculture and allied activities at affordable interest rates.
schemes.eligibility: All farmers - owner cultivators, tenant farmers, sharecroppers, SHGs, JLGs. Also for animal husbandry and fisheries.
schemes.benefits: Credit limit up to ₹3 lakh at 4% interest (7% - 3% subvention). ATM enabled card. 3% additional interest subvention for timely repayment (effective rate 4%).
how_to_apply: Visit nearest bank branch (any scheduled bank)

schemes.scheme_name: Soil Health Card Scheme (मृदा स्वास्थ्य कार्ड योजना)
schemes.description: Provides soil health cards to farmers with crop-wise fertilizer recommendations based on soil nutrient status.
schemes.eligibility: All farmers. Soil testing done once every 2-3 years.
schemes.benefits: Free soil testing with recommendations for 12 nutrients (N, P, K, S, Zn, Fe, Cu, Mn, B, pH, EC, OC). Helps optimize fertilizer use and reduce costs.
how_to_apply: Visit nearest Soil Testing Lab or Krishi Vigyan Kendra
Collect soil sample as per guidelines
Receive Soil Health Card with recommendations

schemes.scheme_name: PM-KMY - Pradhan Mantri Kisan Maandhan Yojana (प्रधानमंत्री किसान मानधन योजना)
schemes.description: Voluntary pension scheme for small and marginal farmers providing ₹3,000/month pension after age 60.
schemes.eligibility: Small and marginal farmers aged 18-40 years with less than 2 hectares cultivable land. Not receiving pension from other schemes.
schemes.benefits: ₹3,000 monthly pension after age 60. Government matches farmer's contribution equally. Family pension for spouse.
how_to_apply: Choose contribution amount based on age
Set up auto-debit for monthly contribution

schemes.scheme_name: e-NAM - National Agriculture Market (राष्ट्रीय कृषि बाजार)
schemes.description: Pan-India electronic trading portal networking existing APMC mandis for unified national market. Enables online trading of agricultural commodities.
schemes.eligibility: All farmers, traders, commission agents, and FPOs can register and trade.
schemes.benefits: Better price discovery through competitive bidding, transparent auction, reduced intermediaries, online payment within 24-48 hours, real-time price information.
how_to_apply: Get quality assaying done at e-NAM mandi
List produce and receive competitive bids

schemes.scheme_name: PM-KUSUM (प्रधानमंत्री किसान ऊर्जा सुरक्षा उत्थान महाभियान)
schemes.ministry: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy
schemes.description: Promotes solar pumps and grid-connected solar power plants on agricultural land for farmers.
schemes.eligibility: All farmers for solar pumps. Land owners for grid-connected solar plants on barren/cultivable land.
schemes.benefits: 60% subsidy (30% Central + 30% State) on standalone solar pumps up to 7.5 HP. Additional income from grid-connected solar plants.

components.component_a: 10,000 MW decentralized solar plants on barren land

how_to_apply: Visit pmkusum.mnre.gov.in or State DISCOM portal

schemes.description: ₹1 lakh crore fund for post-harvest management infrastructure and community farming assets.
schemes.eligibility: Farmers, FPOs, PACS, cooperatives, startups, agri-entrepreneurs, state agencies.
schemes.benefits: 3% interest subvention on loans up to ₹2 crore for 7 years. Credit guarantee up to ₹2 crore through CGTMSE.
how_to_apply: Get loan sanctioned with interest subvention

schemes.scheme_name: NFSM - National Food Security Mission (राष्ट्रीय खाद्य सुरक्षा मिशन)
schemes.description: Aims to increase production of rice, wheat, pulses, coarse cereals, and commercial crops through area expansion and productivity enhancement.
schemes.eligibility: All farmers in notified districts growing target crops.
schemes.benefits: 50% subsidy on certified seeds, subsidized farm machinery, cluster demonstrations, INM/IPM demonstrations.
how_to_apply: Get certified seeds at subsidized rates

schemes.scheme_name: RKVY - Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (राष्ट्रीय कृषि विकास योजना)
schemes.description: Comprehensive scheme for agriculture and allied sector development with flexible funding to states for local priorities.
schemes.eligibility: Implemented through State Agriculture Departments. Benefits reach farmers through various state programs.
schemes.benefits: Infrastructure development, value addition, marketing support, agri-enterprise promotion, innovative projects.

schemes.scheme_name: PKVY - Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (परंपरागत कृषि विकास योजना)
schemes.description: Promotes organic farming through cluster approach and PGS (Participatory Guarantee System) certification.
schemes.eligibility: Farmers willing to adopt organic farming. Groups of 50+ farmers forming clusters of at least 20 hectares.
schemes.benefits: ₹50,000 per hectare over 3 years for organic inputs, certification, value addition, and marketing.
how_to_apply: Get trained in organic farming practices
